member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions.RoutePrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets a route prefix for accessing the swagger-ui

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions.IndexStream
member.summary: Gets or sets a Stream function for retrieving the swagger-ui page

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions.DocumentTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets a title for the swagger-ui page

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions.HeadContent
member.summary: Gets or sets additional content to place in the head of the swagger-ui page

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions.ConfigObject
member.summary: Gets the JavaScript config object, represented as JSON, that will be passed to the SwaggerUI

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions.OAuthConfigObject
member.summary: Gets the JavaScript config object, represented as JSON, that will be passed to the initOAuth method

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions.Interceptors
member.summary: Gets the interceptor functions that define client-side request/response interceptors

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions.JsonSerializerOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the optional JSON serialization options to use to serialize options to the HTML document.

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions.ScriptBundlePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path or URL to the Swagger UI JavaScript bundle file.

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions.ScriptPresetsPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path or URL to the Swagger UI JavaScript standalone presets file.

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions.StylesPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path or URL to the Swagger UI CSS file.

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ConfigObject.Urls
member.summary: One or more Swagger JSON endpoints (url and name) to power the UI

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ConfigObject.DeepLinking
member.summary: If set to true, enables deep linking for tags and operations

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ConfigObject.PersistAuthorization
member.summary: If set to true, it persists authorization data and it would not be lost on browser close/refresh

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ConfigObject.DisplayOperationId
member.summary: Controls the display of operationId in operations list

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ConfigObject.DefaultModelsExpandDepth
member.summary: The default expansion depth for models (set to -1 completely hide the models)

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ConfigObject.DefaultModelExpandDepth
member.summary: The default expansion depth for the model on the model-example section

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ConfigObject.DefaultModelRendering
member.summary: Controls how the model is shown when the API is first rendered. (The user can always switch the rendering for a given model by clicking the 'Model' and 'Example Value' links)

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ConfigObject.DisplayRequestDuration
member.summary: Controls the display of the request duration (in milliseconds) for Try-It-Out requests

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ConfigObject.DocExpansion
member.summary: Controls the default expansion setting for the operations and tags. It can be 'list' (expands only the tags), 'full' (expands the tags and operations) or 'none' (expands nothing)

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ConfigObject.Filter
member.summary: If set, enables filtering. The top bar will show an edit box that you can use to filter the tagged operations that are shown. Can be an empty string or specific value, in which case filtering will be enabled using that value as the filter expression. Filtering is case sensitive matching the filter expression anywhere inside the tag

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ConfigObject.MaxDisplayedTags
member.summary: If set, limits the number of tagged operations displayed to at most this many. The default is to show all operations

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ConfigObject.ShowExtensions
member.summary: Controls the display of vendor extension (x-) fields and values for Operations, Parameters, and Schema

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ConfigObject.ShowCommonExtensions
member.summary: Controls the display of extensions (pattern, maxLength, minLength, maximum, minimum) fields and values for Parameters

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ConfigObject.OAuth2RedirectUrl
member.summary: OAuth redirect URL

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ConfigObject.SupportedSubmitMethods
member.summary: List of HTTP methods that have the Try it out feature enabled. An empty array disables Try it out for all operations. This does not filter the operations from the display

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ConfigObject.TryItOutEnabled
member.summary: Controls whether the "Try it out" section should be enabled by default.

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ConfigObject.ValidatorUrl
member.summary: By default, Swagger-UI attempts to validate specs against swagger.io's online validator. You can use this parameter to set a different validator URL, for example for locally deployed validators (Validator Badge). Setting it to null will disable validation

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.OAuthConfigObject.Username
member.summary: Default username for OAuth2 password flow.

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.OAuthConfigObject.ClientId
member.summary: Default clientId

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.OAuthConfigObject.ClientSecret
member.summary: Default clientSecret
member.remarks: Setting this exposes the client secrets in inline javascript in the swagger-ui generated html.

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.OAuthConfigObject.Realm
member.summary: Realm query parameter (for oauth1) added to authorizationUrl and tokenUrl

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.OAuthConfigObject.AppName
member.summary: Application name, displayed in authorization popup

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.OAuthConfigObject.ScopeSeparator
member.summary: Scope separator for passing scopes, encoded before calling, default value is a space (encoded value %20)

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.OAuthConfigObject.Scopes
member.summary: String array of initially selected oauth scopes, default is empty array

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.OAuthConfigObject.AdditionalQueryStringParams
member.summary: Additional query parameters added to authorizationUrl and tokenUrl

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.OAuthConfigObject.UseBasicAuthenticationWithAccessCodeGrant
member.summary: Only activated for the accessCode flow. During the authorization_code request to the tokenUrl, pass the Client Password using the HTTP Basic Authentication scheme (Authorization header with Basic base64encode(client_id + client_secret))

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.OAuthConfigObject.UsePkceWithAuthorizationCodeGrant
member.summary: Only applies to authorizatonCode flows. Proof Key for Code Exchange brings enhanced security for OAuth public clients. The default is false

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.InterceptorFunctions.RequestInterceptorFunction
member.summary: MUST be a valid Javascript function. Function to intercept remote definition, "Try it out", and OAuth 2.0 requests. Accepts one argument requestInterceptor(request) and must return the modified request, or a Promise that resolves to the modified request. Ex: "function (req) { req.headers['MyCustomHeader'] = 'CustomValue'; return req; }"

member.name: P:ZhonTai.ApiUI.InterceptorFunctions.ResponseInterceptorFunction
member.summary: MUST be a valid Javascript function. Function to intercept remote definition, "Try it out", and OAuth 2.0 responses. Accepts one argument responseInterceptor(response) and must return the modified response, or a Promise that resolves to the modified response. Ex: "function (res) { console.log(res); return res; }"

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.InjectStylesheet(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Injects additional CSS stylesheets into the index.html page
member.param: A path to the stylesheet - i.e. the link "href" attribute
The target media - i.e. the link "media" attribute

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.InjectJavascript(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Injects additional Javascript files into the index.html page
member.param: A path to the javascript - i.e. the script "src" attribute
The script type - i.e. the script "type" attribute

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.SwaggerEndpoint(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds Swagger JSON endpoints. Can be fully-qualified or relative to the UI page
member.param: Can be fully qualified or relative to the current host
The description that appears in the document selector drop-down

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.EnableDeepLinking(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions)
member.summary: Enables deep linking for tags and operations

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.EnablePersistAuthorization(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions)
member.summary: Enables persist authorization data

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.DisplayOperationId(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions)
member.summary: Controls the display of operationId in operations list

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.DefaultModelsExpandDepth(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions,System.Int32)
member.summary: The default expansion depth for models (set to -1 completely hide the models)

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.DefaultModelExpandDepth(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions,System.Int32)
member.summary: The default expansion depth for the model on the model-example section

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.DefaultModelRendering(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions,ZhonTai.ApiUI.ModelRendering)
member.summary: Controls how the model is shown when the API is first rendered. (The user can always switch the rendering for a given model by clicking the 'Model' and 'Example Value' links.)

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.DisplayRequestDuration(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions)
member.summary: Controls the display of the request duration (in milliseconds) for Try-It-Out requests

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.DocExpansion(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions,ZhonTai.ApiUI.DocExpansion)
member.summary: Controls the default expansion setting for the operations and tags. It can be 'List' (expands only the tags), 'Full' (expands the tags and operations) or 'None' (expands nothing)

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.EnableFilter(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions,System.String)
member.summary: Enables filtering. The top bar will show an edit box that you can use to filter the tagged operations that are shown. If an expression is provided it will be used and applied initially. Filtering is case sensitive matching the filter expression anywhere inside the tag

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.EnableTryItOutByDefault(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions)
member.summary: Enables the "Try it out" section by default.

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.MaxDisplayedTags(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions,System.Int32)
member.summary: Limits the number of tagged operations displayed to at most this many. The default is to show all operations

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.ShowExtensions(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions)
member.summary: Controls the display of vendor extension (x-) fields and values for Operations, Parameters, and Schema

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.ShowCommonExtensions(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions)
member.summary: Controls the display of extensions (pattern, maxLength, minLength, maximum, minimum) fields and values for Parameters

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.SupportedSubmitMethods(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions,ZhonTai.ApiUI.SubmitMethod[])
member.summary: List of HTTP methods that have the Try it out feature enabled. An empty array disables Try it out for all operations. This does not filter the operations from the display

member.summary: OAuth redirect URL

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.EnableValidator(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions,System.String)
member.summary: You can use this parameter to enable the swagger-ui's built-in validator (badge) functionality Setting it to null will disable validation

member.summary: Default clientId

member.summary: Default userName

member.summary: Default clientSecret
member.remarks: Setting this exposes the client secrets in inline javascript in the swagger-ui generated html.

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.OAuthRealm(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions,System.String)
member.summary: realm query parameter (for oauth1) added to authorizationUrl and tokenUrl

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.OAuthAppName(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions,System.String)
member.summary: Application name, displayed in authorization popup

member.summary: Scope separator for passing scopes, encoded before calling, default value is a space (encoded value %20)

member.summary: String array of initially selected oauth scopes, default is empty array

member.summary: Additional query parameters added to authorizationUrl and tokenUrl

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.OAuthUseBasicAuthenticationWithAccessCodeGrant(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions)
member.summary: Only activated for the accessCode flow. During the authorization_code request to the tokenUrl, pass the Client Password using the HTTP Basic Authentication scheme (Authorization header with Basic base64encoded[client_id:client_secret]). The default is false

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.OAuthUsePkce(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions)
member.summary: Only applies to authorizatonCode flows. Proof Key for Code Exchange brings enhanced security for OAuth public clients. The default is false

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.UseRequestInterceptor(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions,System.String)
member.summary: Function to intercept remote definition, "Try it out", and OAuth 2.0 requests.
member.param: MUST be a valid Javascript function: (request: SwaggerRequest) => SwaggerRequest

member.name: M:ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptionsExtensions.UseResponseInterceptor(ZhonTai.ApiUI.ApiUIOptions,System.String)
member.summary: Function to intercept remote definition, "Try it out", and OAuth 2.0 responses.
member.param: MUST be a valid Javascript function: (response: SwaggerResponse ) => SwaggerResponse
